answers.answer: No you should be fine because I do it at least once a week and I took my GTT on Monday and everything was perfect
Should be fine just over ate lol
LOL if eating a whole tub of ice cream increases your chances of gestational diabetes I think I would have gotten it like my first week of pregnancy! You should be fine Hun :)
Lol u will be fine my gf ate a whole bag of krispe kreme doughnuts lol

Few weeks ago I had the fudge brownie one and then in the middle of the night I finished my hubbys strawberry short cake one!!! Lol I have days where I just NEED it Lol and I passed my glucose test 2 weeks ago!!

question: I just ate an entire thing of Ben and jerrys ice cream. Now I feel horrible! Is there any chance that it could hurt my baby? It's obviously a lot of sugar and now I am worrying myself :/ I eat pretty healthy and just had a crazy craving for it! I know about gestational diabetis and I'm worried i juat upped my chances! I get tested for it in 3 weeks.
title: uuhg.
